name: Hyperinflation
description:
"By a continuing process of inflation, government can confiscate, secretly and unobserved, an important part of the wealth of their citizens." -John Maynard Keynes

$20,000,000 Lira (Central Bank Turkey 2001) $100,000,000,000 Drachmai (Greece/German & Italian Occupation 1944) $500,000 Lire (Banca d'Italia Italy 1997) $5,000,000,000 Dinara (National Bank Yugoslavia 1993) $1,000,000,000,000,000,000,000 B-Pengo (National Bank Hungary 1946) $10,000,000 Marek (State Loan Bank Poland 1923) $100,000,000 Mark (Republic Treasury Note Germany 1923)
